name: International Conference on Game Theory and Microeconomics
content: International Conference on Game Theory and Microeconomics (GTM 2020) will be held during March 13-15, 2020 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Game theory, Decision Theory, Pricing, Microeconomics, Information Economics, Labour economicsï¼Œ Opportunity cost and other Related Topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
